newsitem.title: INDIA: India CRISIL gives P1+ rating for Warren Tea Ltd.
newsitem.headline: India CRISIL gives P1+ rating for Warren Tea Ltd.

text.p: India's Credit Rating Information Services of India Ltd (CRISIL) said on Wednesday it has assigned a "P1+" rating to the proposed 50 million rupees commercial paper programme of Warren Tea Limited (WTL) indicating that the degree of safety regarding timely payment on the instrument is very strong.
The rating reflects WTL's strong market position in the quality conscious segments of the domestic and exports tea market, a favourable capital structure and a comfortable liquidity position.
WTL's absence from the packet tea segment and its declining profitability and accruals in the past are areas of concern, CRISIL said in a statement.
